scripts.start:local: npm run build && NODE_ENV=local node src/index.js --update-network-cache  --log-dir simulation-script-data/log --cache-dir simulation-script-data/cache
scripts.start:develop: npm run build && NODE_ENV=develop node src/index.js --update-network-cache   --debug true --log-dir simulation-script-data/log --cache-dir simulation-script-data/cache
scripts.start:beta: npm run build && NODE_ENV=beta node src/index.js --update-network-cache  --log-dir simulation-script-data/log --cache-dir simulation-script-data/cache
scripts.start:ts: npm run build && NODE_ENV=simulation ./node_modules/.bin/ts-node src/index.ts --update-network-cache  --log-dir simulation-script-data/log --cache-dir simulation-script-data/cache
